result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jesus Flores

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jesus Flores in court.  Attorney Adam J Snavely appeared by video for Jesus Flores.  Prosecuting attorney Jill L. Vendetti in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
IA reset to 12-19-2022 at 09:00am to ride with the arraignment in 22CF123.
Adjourned initial appearance on December 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on November 3, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:38 am - Defendant Jesus Flores in court.  Attorney Adam J Snavely in court for Jesus Flores.  Prosecuting attorney Jill L. Vendetti appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant would like Attorney Snavely to withdraw.  He wishes to obtain private counsel.  He asks for 2-3 months to do so.  The Court doesn't believe that the defendant has a good reason to have Attorney Snavely withdraw.  The preliminary hearing will be reset and Attorney Snavely will remain on this case for now and if private counsel is retained before the next date, a substitution of attorneys can be filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on November 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

9:23 am - Prosecuting attorney Jill L. Vendetti in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jesus Flores in court.  Attorney Adam J Snavely in court for Jesus Flores. Riding along with 22 CF 123.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 20, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.addlTxt:
Riding along with 22 CF 123 set for PH on 08-02-22 at 9:00 a.m.  
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Jesus Flores
Current: 1222 S. 36th Street A, Manitowoc, WI 54220   (Effective: 07-15-2022)
Prior: 1226 S 36Th St, Manitowoc, WI 54220
Amended Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail
$100.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Order to report to MTPD for photo and prints

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of disorderly conduct, possess THC and resist officer.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 07-18-22 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $100.00 cash bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 48 hours or, if incarcerated, within 72 hours of release and defendant is to have no contact with Shoot the Bull Bar at 806 Buffalo Street, Manitowoc, WI  54220.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the custody of the Sheriff.
Minutes.

Order to Seal Probable Cause Statement.
